import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { GameConfig } from '../App'; interface GameSetupProps { gameConfig: GameConfig; onConfigChange: (config: GameConfig) => void; onStartGame: () => void; onBack: () => void; } const ALL_CATEGORIES = [ 'Bollywood Movies', 'Indian Food', 'Cricket', 'Indian Cities', 'Festivals', 'Indian Sweets', 'Bollywood Actors', 'Indian States', 'Street Food', 'Indian Traditions', 'Hindi Songs', 'Indian Monuments', 'Indian Games', 'Indian Clothing', 'Indian Brands', 'Indian TV Shows', 'Indian Mythology', 'Indian Languages', 'Indian Dance Forms', 'Indian Spices' ]; const GameSetup: React.FC = ({ gameConfig, onConfigChange, onStartGame, onBack, }) => { const updateConfig = (updates: Partial) => { onConfigChange({ ...gameConfig, ...updates }); }; return (
